Lines.Speaker: Jenny
Lines.Text: Could you recommend me a book please about dragons?

Choices.Text: Certainly, I'll just go fetch one

Lines.Speaker: Jenny
Lines.Text: Did you find a good one?

Choices.Text: Of course! This one should suffice
